T02n2955u_001:0: mahāpaṇḍitaniḥsaṁgācāryakuladattaviracitā kriyāsaṁgrahapañjikā 1-4 bhūmiparīkṣā tatra śubhe divasavārādau pūjāpuraḥsaraṁ bhūmiparīkṣā kāryā 1-4-1 parityājyā bhūmiḥ [1] yady aniṣṭavṛkṣādiyuktā bhūs tadā sā parityayājyā |
T02n2955u_001:1: tataś ca yasyāṁ bhuvi pūrvādidikṣv anukrameṇāśvatthārjunaplakṣapalāśanyadrodhaśālmalībakulodumbarasakaṇṭakavṛkṣāḥ putrastrīdhanaviyogaśatrubhayavittanāśastrīdurācāraparijanaparihaṇadhānyādivrīhivināśadoṣadā sā bhavatīti varjyā |
T02n2955u_001:2: tad uktaṁ aindryāṁ nyased vaṭam udumbaram eva yām yāṁ kurvīta pippalam athāpi ca paścimena |
T02n2955u_001:3: plakṣaṁ tathottaradiśāsu śubhāni kuryād viparyayaṁ punar ime'pi viparyayasthāḥ ||
T02n2955u_001:5: [2] yāś ca dharā daṇḍaśakaṭasūryapannagakūrmacāpabṛhanmukhamurajatrikoṇavyajanākārapaṅkagartaviṣamabahavas tāḥ khalu paśudhanadhānyakṣayacakṣūrogabandhanapīḍanacaurāgnibhayārthastrīnāśanṛpabhīvittanāśadāridryaśokadoṣadā bhavanti |
T02n2955u_001:6: [3] yā apy agniyamarakṣombuvāyudikplavās tā niyamena dāhamṛtyurogadaridratvaripuvardhanāni kurvanti bhūmayaḥ |
T02n2955u_001:7: [4] yā ca bhūḥ śvaśṛgāloṣṭrabhinnabhāṇḍasvanā sāśubhadā bhavati |
T02n2955u_001:10: nāgahradacaityādyāśramadevatāyatanāni ca yatra santi sā ca bhūr vigarhitā |
T02n2955u_001:11: [7] yatra cācalāyāṁ dikṣu vidikṣu ca yatra tatrāpi kaṇṭakavṛkṣalatāviṭapaśuṣkavṛkṣāḥ santi sā cāpraśastā iti |
T02n2955u_001:14: [2] yāś ca pūrvottareśadikplavās tāḥ śrīmatyaḥ sukhakāriṇyo bhavanti |
T02n2955u_001:15: yatra ca rasāyām uttaradigbhāge sarovaraḥ sitaraktakusumitapadmaṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaḥ,
T02n2955u_001:19: tatraivāntare javābandhūkāmilādayaḥ puṣpaviṭapā yāvanto raktapuṣpaviṭapāś ceti;
T02n2955u_001:20: evaṁ dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi punnāganāgakesarapārijātakacampakāśokā viśeṣato bakulavṛkṣāḥ santi,
T02n2955u_001:21: tatrāntare jātīkundamallikāsugandhataravaḥ santi yāvantaḥ sitapuṣpaviṭapāś ceti;
T02n2955u_001:23: yāvantaḥ kṣīrataravas te sarve paścime praśastāḥ,
T02n2955u_001:25: [3] api ca sāmānyena vīṇāveṇuvṛṣabhadundubhisvanā vibhūtikāriṇī bhūḥ syāt |
T02n2955u_001:27: tadyathā sitavarṇā dadhidugdhaghṛtādigandhā madhurarasā brāhmaṇānāṁ yogyā |
T02n2955u_001:31: hastamātraṁ khanitvā tayaiva mṛdā gartam āpūrya nyūnādhikasamā yāḥ sthitās tā adhomottamamadhyamāḥ |
T02n2955u_001:32: athavā caturasraṁ dvihastapramāṇaṁ gartaṁ nikhanya tanmadhye maṇḍalakaṁ kṛtvā pūrvasyāṁ diśi sitavarṇakusumaṁ sthāpayet |
T02n2955u_001:34: yaiṣāṁ na mlāyate sā tadyogyā bhavati |
T02n2955u_001:35: tatraiva garte pūrvādidikṣv āmakumbhopari pakvaśarāvakeṣu sitādivartibhir gavyājyaiḥ pradīpam ujjvālya parikṣayet |
T02n2955u_001:36: tatra yadi sitavartiḥ prajvalati tadā sā bhūr brāhmaṇānāṁ yogyā |
T02n2955u_001:37: evaṁ raktapītakṛṣṇānāṁ yathāsaṁkhyaṁ kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrāṇāṁ bhavati sā bhūḥ |
T02n2955u_001:38: evaṁ kuśaśarośīradūrvābahulā dharā anukrameṇa brāhmaṇādīnāṁ yogyāḥ |
T02n2955u_001:41: 1-4-3 (the case that a suitable ground is not found)
T02n2955u_001:42: evaṁ yathoktalakṣaṇānāṁ dharaṇīnām abhāve yathāprāptāyā viśuddhāyāḥ kṣoṇyāḥ svajātisaṁpādanaṁ kṛtvā parigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T02n2955u_001:43: 3-3 kalaśasthādhivāsanā parikramānantaraṁ yathāvidhivartitamaṇḍale pañcopacārapūjābhiḥ paripūjite kalaśān adhivāsayet |
T02n2955u_001:44: 3-3-1 pakṣatrayam tatra tripañcāśad ekādaśa pañca vā |
T02n2955u_001:45: 3-3-1-1 tripañcāśatpakṣaḥ tripañcāśatpakṣe sarvamāṇḍaleyānāṁ pratyekaṁ sārvakarmikakalaśena catuḥpañcāśat |
T02n2955u_001:72: 3-3-4 (Meditation) tad anu tīrthāmbupañcaratnauṣadhīvrīhigandhagarbhān vilasatpallavānanān samālyavastrāmbarakandharān dhvajātapatrasuvarṇatilakadvinetrālaktakayajñopavītair upaśobhitān lājākṣata kusumbhaphalinīpūgaparipūritodarān navīnadarbhakṛtakuṇḍalāsanasthān sārvakarmikamantrādhiṣṭhitadūrvākundāpatitagomayasitasarṣapaiḥ kṛtarakṣān ( ) |
T02n2955u_001:73: tatra samāhitaḥ sann ācāryo jhaṭiti vaṁkārapariṇatanānāratnamayaṁ kalaśam ākārajaśukladharmodayāntarasthaṁ vibhāvya,
T02n2955u_001:74: tad anu svasvabījacihnapariṇāmena svasvadevatāṁ vicintya svahṛdbījamayūkhāṅkuśair jñānasattvam ānīya purato dṛṣṭvā pādyācamanādikaṁ ca dadyāt
T02n2955u_001:75: tac ca samayasattve praveśya mahārāgeṇa dravībhūya bodhicittarūpāmṛtībhūtaṁ cintayet |
T02n2955u_001:77: tato vajrāsaktapuṣpamālāntaṁ pañcasūtraṁ vajraghaṇṭāsahitavāmamuṣṭyā gṛhītvā oṁ sarvatathāgatamahāyogīśvara hūṁ iti cakreśasya hṛdayamantreṇa
T02n2955u_001:78: oṁ vajrayakṣa hūṁ iti sārvakarmikamantreṇa ca tridhābhimantrya punar vajrayakṣamantreṇaivābhimantritapuṣpatrayaṁ nikṣipya,
T02n2955u_001:80: tad anu vijayādighaṭān puṣpādibhiḥ saṁpūjya sārvakarmikakalaśavāriṇābhyukṣya baliṁ ca dattvā'sarvavyāpi'tyādistutipuraḥsaraṁ ghaṇṭāṁ vādayet
T02n2955u_001:83: [1] namas te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya te namaḥ |
T02n2955u_001:84: namas te vajradharmāya namas te vajrakarmaṇe ||
T02n2955u_001:85: [2] tatas tebhyaḥ kalaśebhyaḥ stokastokam udakam ādāya sārvakarmikakalaśe prakṣipet |
T02n2955u_001:86: yasyācāryasya vajradhātau nādhimokṣas tasya sveṣṭadevatādhimokṣeṇa bhūśodhanapratiṣṭhāparyanteṣu sarvakriyākaraṇam aviruddham |
T02n2955u_001:88: tatra maṇḍalasya pūrvadvāram ārabhya dakṣiṇāvartena vijayakalaśādīn akṣobhyakalaśaparyantān nyaset |
T02n2955u_001:89: pūrvadvāre cakreśasya vijayakalaśaṁ tadanukrameṇa vajrāṅkuśavajrarāgavajrasādhusarvāpāyañjahasarvaśokatamonirghāṅgkuśavajrarāgavajrasādhusarvāpāyañjahasarvaśokatamonirghātanamativajralāsyāsattvavajrīvajradhūpāgandhahastiśūraṅgamavajratejavajraratnānāṁ trayodaśa kalaśāni |
T02n2955u_001:93: sārvakarmikakalaśaṁ tu bāhyadigapekṣayeśānakoṇe kalaśapaṅkter abhyantare sthāpanīyam |
T02n2955u_001:94: iti prāgadhivāsitakalaśānāṁ maṇḍalacakram ekaikaṁ pradakṣiṇaṁ kārayitvā maṇḍalacakrasya cakravāḍajvālāvalībhūmer bahiḥ kalaśānāṁ sthāpanam |
T02n2955u_001:97: 3-5 sūtrapātanam 3-5-1 pañca pañca sūtrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni tato maṇḍaleśayogavān ācārya ākāśe sarvatathāgatān avalambya saṁpūjyākṣatakanyākartitāni vīrakrayakrītāni vā pañca pañca sūtrāṇi sitapītaraktaharitakṛṣṇair varṇakaiḥ pṛthak pṛthag rañjitāni vuṁ-āṁ-jrīṁ-khaṁ-hūṁ iti pañcatathāgatabījaniṣpannāni tair evādhitiṣṭhet |
T02n2955u_001:98: 3-5-2 pañcatathāgataṁ prārthayet tad anu ākāśasthapañcatathāgatahṛdayeṣu vuṁkārādibījaniṣpannāni jñānasūtrāṇi raśmimayāni dṛṣṭvā,
T02n2955u_001:99: oṁ āḥ śāśvata vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 1)
T02n2955u_001:102: evam, oṁ āḥ ratneśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 2)
T02n2955u_001:104: oṁ āḥ amiteśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 3)
T02n2955u_001:106: oṁ āḥ amogheśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 4)
T02n2955u_001:108: oṁ āḥ citteśa vajrasūtraṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ( 5)
T02n2955u_001:115: 3-5-3 sūtrāṇi pañcaviṁśatyā bheditāni jato jaḥkārapītacandrasūryasvarūpacakṣurdvayaḥ oṁ dīptadṛṣṭyaṅkuśi jaḥ ( 6)
T02n2955u_001:117: ity uccārya pradrutapracalaccakṣuḥpakṣmākarṣaṇalocanayā dīptadṛṣṭyāṅkuśeneva tāni vairocanādibhiḥ preṣitāny ākṛṣya tatraiva svasvavarṇasūtreṣv antar niveśayet |
T02n2955u_001:118: ata eva tāny ādarśādipañcajñānamayāny ādarśajñānādīnāṁ ca pratyekaṁ caturjñānānugamāt pañcaviṁśatyā bheditāni bhavati |
T02n2955u_001:119: 3-5-4 ekasūtraṁ valayet tad anu sārvakarmikarūpeṇa karmācāryeṇa sūtradhāriṇā saha prathamaṁ pañcapañcasūtrair ekaikaṁ sūtraṁ valayet |
T02n2955u_001:120: tad anu tathāvalitaiḥ pañcabhir ekasūtram oṁ anyonyānugatāḥ sarvadharmāḥ parasparānupraviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmā atyantānupraviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
T02n2955u_001:123: 3-5-5 brahmasūtrapātanam valanānantaram upaviśya suvarṇādibhājane nidhāya gandhapuṣpadhūpaiś cābhyarcya sārvakarmikamantreṇārakṣya,
T02n2955u_001:129: iti mantreṇa sarvakumbhodakeṇa saṁprokṣya puṣpair avakīrya gaganatalagateṣṭadevatāmaṇḍalam avalambyārghadānapuraḥsaraṁ saṁpūjya natvā svayaṁ tadyogavān uttarasādhakaṁ sārvakarmikarūpaṁ vicintya svasya tasya ca vāmetaracakṣuṣor jjaḥkārajau pītāvabhāsau candrasūryau dhyātvā sūtraṁ vāmavajramuṣṭinā gṛhītaṁ nābhau dhārayan taṁ cottarasādhakaṁ tathaiva gṛhītasūtraṁ “jjaḥ-jjaḥ-jjaḥ“ iti jjaḥkārais tribhiḥ saṁpreṣyottarasādhake “jjaḥ-jjaḥ-jjaḥ“ iti trijjaḥkāraiś cākṛṣya tathaivābhimukhaṁ sthite paścimadiksthaḥ pūrvadiṅmukho dakṣiṇadikṣtha uttaradiṅmukho brahmasūtradvayaṁ nābhisame'ntarīkṣe pātayan savajradakṣiṇakarāṅgulībhyāṁ sūtram ādāyācchaṭādhvaniṁ kuryāt |
T02n2955u_001:134: tena ca sūtradhvaninā sarvākāśavyāpinas tathāgatān saṁcodayet |
T02n2955u_001:136: asya hi dhvaneḥ sattvārthe bhavatāṁ kālas tad ihāgamyatām iti sāṁketiko'rthaḥ |
T02n2955u_001:137: sarvatra cācārya uttarasādhakaś ca pradakṣiṇaṁ gacchet |
T02n2955u_001:139: khasūtradvayavad bhūmau brahmasūtradvayam ubhayoḥ samaṁ lambitābhyāṁ sasūtrahastābhyāṁ pātanīyam |
T02n2955u_001:140: 3-5-6 diṅmūlapārśvasūtrapātanam tataṣ ṭakkikīlakāvasthito vajravidāraṇakīlakābhimukhaḥ pūrvadiksutraṁ pātayet |
T02n2955u_001:141: tad anu vajrāntacarakīlakagato vajrāṭṭahāsakīlakābhimukhaḥ pūrvamūlasūtraṁ pātayet |
T02n2955u_001:143: tad anu padanikṣepakīlakāvasthito vajrapalālakīlakābhimukhaḥ paścimamūlasūtraṁ pātayet |
T02n2955u_001:145: tad anu vajrabhīmakīlakastho vajravidrāpakakīlakamukha uttaramūlasūtraṁ pātayet |
T02n2955u_001:148: tad anu padmāntakakīlakastho vajrāṅkuśakīlakamukhaḥ pārśvasūtraṁ pātayet |
T02n2955u_001:154: iti jñānasūtraṁ visarjya nabhaḥsthatathāgatahṛtsu niveśya pañcaraṅgikasūtraṁ yathāsthāne sthāpayet |
T02n2955u_001:155: iti sūtrapātanakramaḥ 3-5-7 nimittoktiḥ animittair asiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ iti vacanān nimittāny upalakṣayet |
T02n2955u_001:162: ajāvibhyāṁ laṅghane tayor asthi gor asthi vā |
T02n2955u_001:174: [4] śiraḥkaṇḍūyanaṁ yady ācāryaśilpiyajamānatanniyogijanānāṁ madhye kaścit karoti tadaikapauruṣād adhaḥ śalyam asti |
T02n2955u_001:179: karṇakaṇḍūyane karṇāntādhastād rūpyaṁ suvarṇaṁ vidrumaṁ vā bhavet |
T02n2955u_001:185: dakṣiṇakarasparśe kaṭimātrādhaḥ pṛṣṭha kapālaṁ mnmayakapālaṁ vā |
T02n2955u_001:197: [5] sūtrapātanasamaye yajamānasya pārśve sthitvā kenacid anyena puruṣeṇa yasya prāṇino nāma saṁkīrtyate tadasthi tatrāstīti niścayaḥ |
T02n2955u_001:198: [6] akasmād gaur āgatya yadi viṣṭhām utsṛjati tadadho'vaśyaṁ tatpramāṇaṁ kanakam astīti niścīyate |
T02n2955u_001:199: yady akasmād āgatya purīṣam utsṛjati bālakumārikā tadā tadadho'vaśyaṁ tatpramāṇaṁ rūpyaṁ bhavet |
T02n2955u_001:210: tad anu kṛtasūtrapātana ācāryo janadhanabalavivṛddhaye savajradakṣiṇakareṇa suvarṇaśalākikām ādāya,
